CreditMemoAddressGroup.name: CreditMemoAddressGroup
CreditMemoAddressGroup.description: Represents the storage of the buyer's address information, which is used to determine the tax credit amount for a buyer when a credit memo is issued.

CreditMemoAddressGroupNumber.description: Required. The auto-generated reference number for the credit memo address group.

CreditMemoId.description: Required. The ID of the credit memo associated with the address group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a credit memo address group record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a credit memo address group record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the credit memo address group record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the credit memo address group record itself.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code associated with the credit memo.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy rating for the geocode of the address group. An accuracy rating contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude.

PostalCode.description: The buyer’s postal code or ZIP code.

Street.description: The buyer’s street number and name.
